text: Jeffrey Wright (born December 7, 1965) is an American actor. He is best known for his Tony- and Emmy-winning role as Belize in the Broadway production and HBO miniseries Angels in America. He is also known for his roles as Felix Leiter in the James Bond movies Casino Royale, Quantum of Solace and No Time to Die, Narcisse in the HBO series Boardwalk Empire, and Beetee in The Hunger Games movies. He also played Commissioner James Gordon in the 2022 movie The Batman. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:African-American movie actors Category:African-American television actors Category:African-American voice actors Category:African-American stage actors Category:Actors from Washington, D.C. Category:Actors who played Felix Leiter
title: Jeffrey Wright
